mappings.name: Revoke an existing OAuth2 access token

message.description: A message describing the error that occurred

type.description: A short string representing the type of error that occurred

schema.description: A simple representation of an error result from an API call, rarely used; in most cases we still return a Collection.doc+JSON document for errors

schema.description: A simple representation of an error result from an API call, rarely used; in most cases we still return a Collection.doc+JSON document for errors

mappings.name: Create a new OAuth2 access token

access_token.description: The access token to use for all future calls

expires_in.description: The remaining lifetime of the access token (in seconds)

refresh_token.description: The refresh token that can be used to obtain a new access token if the old one expires; if a refresh token is returned, it is the client's responsibility to securely cache it for future use.

token_type.description: Identifies the type of token returned. At this time, this field always has the value `Bearer`.

mappings.name: Initiate an OAuth2 login flow for limited input devices

message.description: A message describing the error that occurred

type.description: A short string representing the type of error that occurred

schema.description: A simple representation of an error result from an API call, rarely used; in most cases we still return a Collection.doc+JSON document for errors

mappings.name: Initiate an OAuth2 login flow for limited input devices

device_code.description: 40-character code for the device to input into the /token endpoint, not for display to the user

expires_in.description: The number of seconds for which this set of codes will be valid, after which they will be purged

interval.description: The number of seconds the client application should maintain between requests to the /token endpoint

user_code.description: 6-character alphanumeric code for the user to enter at http://npr.org/device, to be displayed by the client application

verification_uri.description: The URL where the user should input their code, to be displayed by the client application
